meanings.definition: The action or process of finishing something.
meanings.sent1: Her completion of the puzzle brought her great satisfaction.
meanings.sent2: The completion of the project took longer than expected.
meanings.sent3: His completion of the race was celebrated with cheers and applause.
meanings.sent4: The completion of the marathon marked the end of months of training.
meanings.sent5: The completion of the painting left the artist feeling accomplished.

meanings.definition: The state of being fully done or finished.
meanings.sent1: The completion of the construction project was a relief for the team.
meanings.sent2: The completion of the exam signaled the end of the school year.
meanings.sent3: His completion of the meal left him feeling full and content.
meanings.sent4: The completion of the novel brought a sense of closure to the story.
meanings.sent5: The completion of the jigsaw puzzle revealed a beautiful picture.
